channel.title: Couple of questions
channel.description:
How do I go onto a different server IP?
Why does it keep on losing connection?

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @frogy7 frogy7
item.description:
@frogy7 wrote:

[quote=“s o l o n g, post:12, topic:109378”]What t cups and alex said were correct and with hamachi it will guide u threw the first steps and when it says hamachi network and pass those are what u should use from the Moparscape advertisement section if u need hamachi for some1s servers but alot are no-ip which do not require hamachi

P.S. People usually short hamachi for Ham.[/quote]Okay, Thank you. =)

Read full topic

item.description:
@s_o_l_o_n_g wrote:

What t cups and alex said were correct and with hamachi it will guide u threw the first steps and when it says hamachi network and pass those are what u should use from the Moparscape advertisement section if u need hamachi for some1s servers but alot are no-ip which do not require hamachi

P.S. People usually short hamachi for Ham.

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @frogy7 frogy7
item.description:
@frogy7 wrote:

[quote=“t cups, post:6, topic:109378”]to get hamachi go here www.hamachi.cc and you will see if they have hamachi in the advertisements section in the persons post.[/quote]Do I have to have a account?

Where are the posts?[quote=“alex4ever, post:7, topic:109378”][quote author=t cups link=topic=156502.msg1470893#msg1470893 date=1181622165]
to get hamachi go here www.hamachi.cc and you will see if they have hamachi in the advertisements section in the persons post.
[/quote]some yes are hamachi some u gatta change the port like he defult is 43594 some are like 5555 and stuff and if u r looking on the server status page it is refreshed every 15 min so u some will say they r are on line but there not and if u look in the advertisements section well then the owner sometime for get to turn it off[/quote]Excuse me?

Read full topic

item.description:
@frogy7 wrote:

[quote=“t cups, post:4, topic:109378”]ok update your java for the diconnection problem and you need hamachi to connect to other servers if somebody has hamachi[/quote]Alright, but how do I get Hamachi and how would I know that they have Hamachi?

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @frogy7 frogy7
item.description:
@frogy7 wrote:

[quote=“t cups, post:2, topic:109378”][quote author=frogy7 link=topic=156502.msg1470843#msg1470843 date=1181621631]
How do I go onto a different server IP?

Why does it keep on losing connection?
[/quote]

to get onto another server you must have the other persons ip address and the port of their sever and if they have hamachi then add their hamachi network

what loses connection?[/quote]I copy an IP address and put it in. It still doesn’t work. Hamachi?

Whenever I’ll be doing whatever in Moparscape, it will lose connection. It will say that its trying to reestablish and another time it says in the black box that I lost connection and I have to exit out and start over.

Read full topic
